name: A Relaxing Summer Job
description:
What's more relaxing than a simple Summer job by the seaside?

Sell ice cream to all the customers that pop up outside your window. Don't mess up their orders and don't let any ice creams fall on the floor. We take pride in our hygiene!

Oh, and be careful with the ice cream machine. It's been making some strange noises lately...

Game made for the GMTK Jam 2020
